akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Sept. 1, 1954, ch. 1208, title III, § 305(d), 68 Stat. 1114

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 58. Repealed. Sept. 1, 1954, ch. 1208, title III, § 305(d), 68 Stat. 1114
Section, act July 17, 1912, ch. 236, 37 Stat. 193, related to awards. See section 4501 et seq. of Title 5, Government Organization and Employees.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealRepeal effective 90 days after Sept. 1, 1954, see section 307 of act Sept. 1, 1954.
